channel.title: Ravers' Fantasy - Bringing back F2P Memories - 75% Working Quest point system!
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/2nt2yd.jpg[/img]
[font=Verdana][b]___Ravers' Fantasy____[/b][/font]
Hello, In these next paragraphs, I will be describing Ravers' Fantasy as a server, and why I picked the name.
I picked the name because I could never find the song "Ravers' Fantasy", I've always loved it. I found it on a pk vid, and it said the name of the song. So I searched it into youtube, and it was right! If you wanna listen to it, type in "Marian - Ravers' Fantasy".
The base IS All-star, I usually use All-Star for all my servers. I usually fail (lol) my projects, but I'm gonna try really hard not to get frustrated with this server. I plan for it to be F2P, with slow training. I hope for it to be about 50-100 xp a hit, since its F2P, and there isn't any armor (besides corrupt)/weapon (besides corrupt) that you need over 40 attack for. The custom items will only consist of corrupt dragon, and MAYBE a new bow for 70+ range. MAYBE.
We are going to try to aim for a server with killer range/2h K0's, Low level scimitar to mage pking, tank pking, and of course, main account pking.
EDIT: Switched to Delta base. Original base was getting weird at times.
____________________________________________________________________________________________________
[b][i][shadow=red,left]Goals[/shadow][/i][/b]
Range with projectiles - 60% Melee - 80% Magic - 25%
Didn't really work on the above, Im planning to do so soon.
Woodcutting - 0% Firemaking - 50% Mining - 0% Smithing - 0% (I will get to this soon) Crafting - 0%
Skills & Economy ^^ Explained Soon
NPCS -
Training NPCS - 0% Shop NPCS - 0%
-Client- Overall 0%
Customs - 0% Sprites - 0% Headicons - 0% Interfaces, options, etc. 10%
[IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/dpxqno.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img160.imageshack.us/img160/7823/webclientshot.jpg[/img]
Webclient ^^
-Website- Karl' is the designer, he's also getting a free dedi for 6 months which is 5|_|p3R 1337! ________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Here's a pic of right click player/npc:
[IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/58f2g.jpg[/img]
__________________________Quests__________________________________________
75% Working quest point system Might remove some quests I don't need, such as "The Wolf's Cure".
*Added Cooks Assistant! 100%!*
Yeah.. That's basically it, comment if you like/dislike it, suggest new ideas, and give me some stuff that I can improve on.
Thanks.
EDIT: If anyone wants to test for me, check out my sig. It's silab atm, and it sucks, but if you want.

item.title: Ravers' Fantasy - Bringing back F2P Memories - 75% Working Quest point system!
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

Thanks Never knew that Cascada somewhat made that song.

Anyways, epic cooks assistant got added. it’s my first quest but it’s working 100%.

[quote=“codexs, post:1, topic:290873”][quote author=–BBLLAARRGGHH– link=topic=381586.msg2883841#msg2883841 date=1248475755]
I clicked on this cos’ I love Cascada lol, It looks really nice, and the idea is brilliant =D
[/quote]

Wdf ravers fantasy is cascada wdf[/quote]
Cascada has 3 members, Natalie Horler, Dj Manian and Dj Yanou. Tune Up! made Ravers fantasy, and they have 2 members, Manian and Yanou.
